At that time, the great assembly, some jumped in the air, some rang bells, some beat drums, some wore straw sandals, some walked on bamboo poles, some walked upside down with their heads down and feet up, some somersaulted like a spinning wheel.

Some hung in the air on ropes and ran, some rode on spears, some jumped with swords, in such countless and boundless ways, with various kinds of jokes and various displays, some shouted loudly, some whistled, some played with their clothes.
